al.[40]":[2266],"recorded":[2267],"number":[2273,2290],"Th17":[2277,3319],"group":[2286,2651],"higher-than-expected":[2289],"cells.":[2294,2770,3240],"Deceased":[2295],"senescent":[2303,2322],"survivors.":[2307],"overly":[2312],"reactive":[2313],"percentage":[2320],"independent":[2327],"death":[2331],"association":[2333],"total":[2335],"lymphocyte":[2336],"polarization":[2341,2364],"damage,":[2348],"removal,":[2350],"processing":[2355],"injury":[2359],"(ALI).":[2361],"Th":[2366],"bacterial-":[2369],"viral-mediated":[2371],"ALI":[2372],"McGregor":[2378],"al.[41]":[2380],"studies,":[2381],"pandemic,":[2385],"many":[2387,3106],"clinic-laboratory":[2388],"reasons,":[2389],"MERS-like":[2391],"lymphopenia,":[2392],"stages,":[2402],"rather":[2413],"response,":[2417,2881,2894],"Tc":[2424],"macrophages.":[2427],"IL4":[2436],"IL5,":[2438],"inhibit":[2440],"protective":[2441,2467,3075],"Thus,":[2448],"imbalance":[2451,2954],"another":[2458],"determinant":[2460],"breakdown":[2463],"host's":[2466],"SARS-CoV-2.":[2470,2787],"displaced":[2472],"generate":[2476],"interstitial":[2477,2503,2514,2524],"infiltrates":[2478],"neutrophils,":[2482],"eosinophils":[2483],"lymphoid":[2488],"mediating":[2490],"damage.":[2494],"fact,":[2496],"critically":[2497,3168],"ill":[2498,3169],"typically":[2501],"infiltrates,":[2505],"resemble":[2509],"forms":[2511],"progressive":[2513],"cryptogenic":[2519],"organizing":[2520],"nonspecific":[2523],"pneumonia.[42]":[2525],"Childrens":[2526],"relatively":[2528],"protected":[2529],"due":[2534,2543,2550],"four":[2535],"possible":[2536],"reasons.":[2537],"First":[2538],"appropriate":[2540],"handling":[2542],"trained":[2545],"(strong":[2547],"response)":[2549],"exposure":[2552],"live":[2554],"infancy":[2557],"childhood":[2559,2653],"BCG,":[2561],"measles,":[2562],"diphtheria,":[2563],"pertussis":[2564],"tetanus,":[2566],"polio":[2567],"&":[2568,2631],"frequent":[2569],"development":[2574],"Second":[2578],"reason":[2579,2598,2616],"ACE-2":[2582],"metabolizing": cluding":[1629],"case":[1630],"response.":[1635],"Instructions":[1636],"reporting":[1638],"suspected":[1639],"cases":[1640],"reportable":[1642],"VPDs":[1643],"local":[1645],"state":[1647],"departments":[1649],"significant":[1651],"postvaccination":[1652],"adverse":[1653],"events":[1654],"Adverse":[1658],"Event":[1659],"Reporting":[1660],"System":[1661],"listed.":[1663],"resources,":[1667],"statements,":[1672],"travelers,":[1676],"shared":[1678],"clinical":[1679],"decision-making":[1680],"provided.Table":[1684],"1.":[1685],"Age":[1691],"Group.":[1692],"Table":[1693,1749,1788,1827],"1":[1694,1928,2053],"catch-up":[1698],"2023,":[1706,1842],"row":[1709,1714,1845],"added.":[1712,2263],"entirely":[1716],"yellow":[1717],"indicating":[1718],"now":[1723,1793,1893,2214,2281],"adults,":[1728],"overlay":[1732],"states":[1734,1794,1894,2215,2282],"\"2-":[1735],"3-":[1737],"(See":[1743],"Notes).\"":[1744],"1,":[1750,1789],"overlaying":[1751,1791,1860,1891],"considerations":[1771,1877],"personnel":[1775],"older.":[1783],"\"2,":[1795,1895],"3,":[1796,1896],"depending":[1800,1900],"vaccine\"":[1802,1902],"account":[1804],"possibility":[1807],"accelerated":[1810,1907],"Twinrix":[1811,1908],"requiring":[1813],"doses.Table":[1815],"2.":[1816],"Condition":[1823],"Other":[1825],"Indications.":[1826],"2":[1828,1930,2055],"based":[1834],"medical":[1836,3216],"indications.":[1840],"table.":[1851],"columns":[1857],"\"See":[1862],"Notes,\"":[1863],"since":[1864],"different":[1869],"requirements":[1872],"complement":[1882],"row,":[1889,2174,2198,2267],"4-dose":[1906],"vaccination.Notes.":[1916],"Schedule.":[1920,2111],"Each":[1921],"Tables":[1927,2052],"accompanied":[1932],"designed":[1938],"special":[1949],"situations.":[1950],"note":[1953,1990],"addition":[1957,1973],"Guidance":[1964,2983],"find":[1980],"helpful":[1981],"regarding":[1982,2200,2269,3080,3086],"poliovirus.":[2006],"New":[2007,2465],"respective":[2021],"notes.":[2022],"Changes":[2023],"language.":[2047],"identified":[2050],"(e
